card_1.cardText:
> aToday, California reforms its bail system so that rich and poor alike are treated fairly.”
> 
> CA Gov. Jerry Brown signing a new bill into law aimed at abolishing money bail for those awaiting trial and replacing it with a risk-based assessment system focused on the defendant's risk to public safety and likelihood to return to court.
